vocabularyItems.english: The news will broadcast live from the stadium tonight.
Streaming services have changed how we watch television shows.
I listen to podcasts while commuting to work daily.
The final episode of the series airs next week.
This television series has been running for ten years.
The documentary about wildlife was fascinating and educational to watch.
She prefers watching drama shows over comedy programs always.
The comedy show made everyone laugh until they cried.
The thriller movie kept me on edge throughout.
Horror movies are too scary for young children.
The animation in this film is incredibly detailed and beautiful.
The movie soundtrack features songs from famous artists worldwide.
She wrote the screenplay for the award-winning film herself.
The actors rehearsed the script for weeks before filming.
The director won an award for his outstanding work.
The producer invested millions in the new movie project.
The cinematography in this film is absolutely stunning and memorable.
The editing of the video took several weeks to complete.
The movie premiere attracted many celebrities and fans last night.
The trailer for the new film looks very exciting.
Turn on the subtitles if you can't hear clearly.
The dubbing in foreign films sometimes loses the original emotion.
The narrator's voice made the story come alive beautifully.

The reporter interviewed witnesses at the scene of accident.
The journalist wrote an article about climate change issues.
The columnist writes about politics every week in newspaper.
The editor reviewed all articles before publication carefully today.
The headline on the front page caught everyone's attention.
I read an interesting article about technology this morning.
The publication of the book was delayed by months.
The newspaper has a daily circulation of one million.
I renewed my subscription to the magazine for another year.
Tabloid newspapers often publish sensational stories about celebrities daily.
The press conference will begin at noon sharp today.
The video went viral and got millions of views.
This topic is trending on social media right now.
Social media influencers promote products to their followers regularly.
She has over one million followers on her account.
The channel gained thousands of new subscribers this month.
We can stream the concert live on our phones.
The video keeps buffering due to slow internet connection.
We need more bandwidth to stream high quality videos.
The image has millions of pixels for sharp quality.
The video game has amazing graphics and visual effects.
The user interface is very easy to navigate quickly.
This platform allows users to share videos and photos.
The algorithm recommends videos based on your viewing history.
The analytics show how many people watched the video.
High engagement means people are interacting with your content.
Creating quality content takes time and effort every day.
Content creators make videos for their audience regularly now.
I created a playlist of my favorite songs yesterday.
What genre of music do you prefer listening to?
The melody of this song is very catchy and memorable.
The rhythm makes you want to dance immediately always.
The tempo of the music is fast and energetic.
The voices blend together in perfect harmony beautifully today.
The lyrics of this song are very meaningful and deep.
The first verse of the song is my favorite.
Everyone sang along during the chorus of the song.
The band released a new album last month finally.
The remix of the song is better than original.
The acoustic version of the song is very beautiful.
The instrumental music is perfect for studying and concentration.
Her vocal performance was absolutely outstanding and powerful tonight.
The live performance was better than the recording itself.
The band has rehearsal every Tuesday evening at seven.
She passed the audition and got the lead role.
The casting for the new movie begins next week.
The comedian can improvise jokes on any topic quickly.
The magician entertained the children at the birthday party.
The audience gave a standing ovation with loud applause.
The singer received a standing ovation after her performance.
The crowd demanded an encore after the amazing show.
Fans waited backstage to meet the famous singer yesterday.
The spotlight followed the dancer across the stage beautifully.
The curtain rose and the play began immediately tonight.
There will be a fifteen minute intermission during the show.
The matinee performance starts at two in the afternoon.
The young actress made her debut in this film.
The summer blockbuster broke all box office records worldwide.
The movie was a complete flop at the box office.
The film critic gave the movie five stars rating.
The restaurant received excellent reviews from customers online today.
The show has a high rating on the website.
She won the award for best actress this year.
The film received five nominations at the awards ceremony.
The cinematographer won an award for beautiful camera work.
The screenwriter spent years developing the story and characters.
The actor performed his own dangerous stunts in film.
The sequel to the movie will be released soon.
The prequel explains events before the original story happened.
The movie franchise has made billions of dollars worldwide.
The film earned millions at the box office opening.
The sitcom is a popular comedy show on television.
Soap operas are dramatic television series with continuing storylines.
Reality shows feature real people in unscripted situations daily.
The quiz show tests contestants knowledge with difficult questions.
The gameshow offers cash prizes to lucky winners weekly.

liarGameData.explanation: A2 learners confuse 'see' (perceive with eyes), 'watch' (observe intentionally), and 'look' (direct eyes toward). Use 'watch' for movies/TV.
liarGameData.practice: I see the screen. I watch movies. I look at the poster.
liarGameData.tip: Watch = intentional viewing (TV, movies, sports). See = general perception. Look = direct attention.
